Author: eattillithurts
Text: its really hard for me too, i mean look at my reddit name, buuut i found out, after a lot of trying and hoping, that upping up my fiber intake i eat all around less even if i lose all my shit and binge.  yesterday night i had a fucking urge too kill someone to get some sweets. i ate 400g skyr (like greek yogurt) with 30g psyllium husks and it just doubled in my stomach and i had to drink water. so, maybe something like this will help you to fill up your stomach and calm down your brain?  good luck
